Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at 51st/Campbell
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 55th, Western and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 55th, Western and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Campbell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near LaSalle
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near LaSalle due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near LaSalle due to track switching problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
